id.title: id
id.description: The id of the line item.

variant_id.title: variant_id
variant_id.description: The id of the product variant.

quantity.title: quantity
quantity.description: The number of products that were purchased.

price.title: price
price.description: The price of the item before discounts have been applied.

grams.title: grams
grams.description: The weight of the item in grams.

sku.title: sku
sku.description: A unique identifier of the item in the fulfillment.

variant_title.title: variant_title
variant_title.description: The title of the product variant.

vendor.title: vendor
vendor.description: The name of the supplier of the item.

fulfillment_service.title: fulfillment_service
fulfillment_service.description: Service provider who is doing the fulfillment. Valid values are either "manual" or the name of the provider. eg: "amazon", "shipwire", etc.

product_id.title: product_id
product_id.description: The unique numeric identifier for the product in the fulfillment. Can be null if the original product associated with the order is deleted at a later date

requires_shipping.title: requires_shipping
requires_shipping.description: States whether or not the fulfillment requires shipping. Values are: true or false.

taxable.title: taxable
taxable.description: States whether or not the product was taxable. Values are: true or false.

gift_card.title: gift_card
gift_card.description: States whether or not the line_item is a gift card. If so, the item is not taxed or considered for shipping charges.

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the product variant.

variant_inventory_management.title: variant_inventory_management
variant_inventory_management.description: States the name of the inventory management service.

properties.description: An array of custom information for an item that has been added to the cart. Often used to provide product customization options.

product_exists.title: product_exists
product_exists.description: A value signifying if the product exists within Shopify.  Valid values are true or false.

fulfillable_quantity.title: fulfillable_quantity
fulfillable_quantity.description: The amount available to fulfill. This is the quantity - max(refunded_quantity, fulfilled_quantity) - pending_fulfilled_quantity - open_fulfilled_quantity.

total_discount.title: total_discount
total_discount.description: The total discount amount applied to this line item. This value is not subtracted in the line item price.

fulfillment_status.title: fulfillment_status
fulfillment_status.description: How far along an order is in terms line items fulfilled. Valid values are: fulfilled, null or partial.

tax_lines.title: tax_lines
tax_lines.description: A list of tax_line objects, each of which details the taxes applicable to this line_item.

origin_location.title: origin_location
origin_location.description: The origin location of the Line Item (where it's being shipped from).

destination_location.title: destination_location
destination_location.description: The destination location of the Line Item (where it's being shipped to).

id.title: id
id.description: The unique identifier for the shipping line.

title.title: title
title.description: The title of the shipping method.

price.title: price
price.description: The price of this shipping method.

code.title: code
code.description: A reference to the shipping method.

source.title: source
source.description: The source of the shipping method.

phone.title: phone
phone.description: Phone number associated with the shipping method.

requested_fulfillment_service_id.title: requested_fulfillment_service_id
requested_fulfillment_service_id.description: A reference to the fulfillment service that is being requested for the shipping method. Present if shipping method requires processing by a third party fulfillment service; null otherwise.

delivery_category.title: delivery_category
delivery_category.description: The delivery category assoicated with the shipping method.

carrier_identifier.title: carrier_identifier
carrier_identifier.description: A reference to the carrier service that provided the rate. Present if the rate was computed by a third party carrier service; null otherwise.

tax_lines.title: tax_lines
tax_lines.description: A list of tax_line objects, each of which details the taxes applicable to this shipping_line.

id.title: id
id.description: A unique numeric identifier for the fulfillment.

order_id.title: order_id
order_id.description: The unique numeric identifier for the order.

status.title: status
status.description: The status of the fulfillment. Valid values are: pending, open, success, cancelled, error, failure.

created_at.title: created_at
created_at.description: The date and time when the fulfillment was created. The API returns this value in ISO 8601 format.

service.title: service
service.description: The name of the fulfillment service.

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The date and time when the fulfillment was last modified. The API returns this value in ISO 8601 format.

tracking_company.title: tracking_company
tracking_company.description: The name of the tracking company.

tracking_number.title: tracking_number
tracking_number.description: The tracking number, provided by the shipping company.

tracking_numbers.title: tracking_numbers
tracking_numbers.description: A list of tracking numbers, provided by the shipping company.

tracking_url.title: tracking_url
tracking_url.description: The URL to track the fulfillment.

tracking_urls.title: tracking_urls
tracking_urls.description: The URLs to track the fulfillment.

variant_inventory_management.title: variant_inventory_management
variant_inventory_management.description: States the name of the inventory management service.

notify_customer.title: notify_customer
notify_customer.description: A flag indicating whether the customer should be notified. If set to true, an email will be sent when the fulfillment is created or updated. The default value is true. If you don't specify a value, the customer will receive an email.

first_name.title: first_name
first_name.description: The first name of the person associated with the specific address.

last_name.title: last_name
last_name.description: The last name of the person associated with the specific address.

company.title: company
company.description: The company of the person associated with the address.

address1.title: address1
address1.description: The street address of the address.

address2.title: address2
address2.description: An optional additional field for the street address

province.title: province
province.description: The name of the state or province of the address.

country.title: country
country.description: The name of the country of the address.

zip.title: zip
zip.description: The zip or postal code of the address.

phone.title: phone
phone.description: The phone number at the address.

name.title: name
name.description: The full name of the person associated with the address.

province_code.title: province_code
province_code.description: The abbreviation of the state or province of the address.

country_code.title: country_code
country_code.description: The two-letter code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 two-letter country code) for the country of the address.

customer.title: customer
customer.description: An object containing information about the customer. It is important to note that the order may not have a customer and consumers should not depend on the existence of a customer object. This value may be null if the order was created through Shopify POS

id.title: id
id.description: A unique numeric identifier for the customer.

accepts_marketing.title: accepts_marketing
accepts_marketing.description: Indicates whether or not the customer would like to receive email updates from the shop.

created_at.title: created_at
created_at.description: The date and time when the customer record was created.

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The date and time when the customer record was last updated.

orders_count.title: orders_count
orders_count.description: The number of orders placed by this customer to a shop. Pulls the current information.

state.title: state
state.description: The state of the customer's account in a shop. The state can be changed in the shop admin or by the customer, but not through the API. Valid states are: disabled, invited, enabled, declined.

total_spent.title: total_spent
total_spent.description: The total amount of money that the customer has spent at the shop.

last_order_id.title: last_order_id
last_order_id.description: The id of the customer's last order.

verified_email.title: verified_email
verified_email.description: States whether or not the email address has been verified.

multipass_identifier.title: multipass_identifier
multipass_identifier.description: The customer's identifier used with Multipass login

tax_exempt.title: tax_exempt
tax_exempt.description: Indicates whether the customer should be charged taxes when placing orders.

phone.title: phone
phone.description: The customer's phone number / the unique phone number for this customer. Attempting to assign the same phone number to multiple customers will return an error. Valid formats can be of different types, but must represent a number that can be dialed from anywhere in the world.

tags.title: tags
tags.description: Tags are additional short descriptors, commonly used for filtering and searching, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. For example, if an order has three tags: tag1, tag2, tag3.

last_order_name.title: last_order_name
last_order_name.description: The name of the customer's last order. This is directly related to the Order's name field.

default_address.title: default_address
default_address.description: The default address for the customer.

id.title: id
id.description: The unique numeric identifier for the order. This one is used for API purposes. This is different from the order_number property (see below), which is also a unique numeric identifier for the order, but used by the shop owner and customer.

closed_at.title: closed_at
closed_at.description: The date and time when the order was closed. If the order was closed, the API returns this value in ISO 8601 format. If the order was not closed, this value is null.

created_at.title: created_at
created_at.description: This auto-generated property is the date and time when the order was created in Shopify, in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The date and time when the order was last modified. The API returns this value in ISO 8601 format.

number.title: number
number.description: Numerical identifier unique to the shop. A number is sequential and starts at 1000.

note.title: note
note.description: The text of an optional note that a shop owner can attach to the order.

token.title: token
token.description: Unique identifier for a particular order.

gateway.title: gateway
gateway.description: Deprecated as of July 14, 2014. This information is instead available on transactions The payment gateway used.

test.title: test
test.description: If the order is a test order.

total_price.title: total_price
total_price.description: The sum of all the prices of all the items in the order, taxes and discounts included (must be positive).

subtotal_price.title: subtotal_price
subtotal_price.description: Price of the order before shipping and taxes

total_weight.title: total_weight
total_weight.description: The sum of all the weights of the line items in the order, in grams.

total_tax.title: total_tax
total_tax.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the order (must be positive).

taxes_included.title: taxes_included
taxes_included.description: States whether or not taxes are included in the order subtotal. Valid values are "true" or "false".

currency.title: currency
currency.description: The three letter code (ISO 4217) for the currency used for the payment.

financial_status.title: financial_status
financial_status.description: The financial status of the order. Valid values are: pending, authorized, partially paid, paid, partially_refunded, refunded, voided.

total_discounts.title: total_discounts
total_discounts.description: The total amount of the discounts to be applied to the price of the order.

total_line_items_price.title: total_line_items_price
total_line_items_price.description: The sum of all the prices of all the items in the order.

cart_token.title: cart_token
cart_token.description: Unique identifier for a particular cart that is attached to a particular order.

buyer_accepts_marketing.title: buyer_accepts_marketing
buyer_accepts_marketing.description: Indicates whether or not the person who placed the order would like to receive email updates from the shop. The default value is false.

name.title: name
name.description: The customer's order name as represented by a number.

referring_site.title: referring_site
referring_site.description: The website that the customer clicked on to come to the shop.

landing_site.title: landing_site
landing_site.description: The URL for the page where the buyer landed when entering the shop.

cancelled_at.title: cancelled_at
cancelled_at.description: The date and time when the order was cancelled. If the order was cancelled, the API returns this value in ISO 8601 format. If the order was not cancelled, this value is null

cancel_reason.title: cancel_reason
cancel_reason.description: The reason why the order was cancelled. If the order was not cancelled, this value is null. If the order was cancelled, the value will be one of the following: customer, fraud, inventory, other.

total_price_usd.title: total_price_usd
total_price_usd.description: The total price converted to USD.

user_id.title: user_id
user_id.description: Only present on orders processed at point of sale. The unique numerical identifier for the user logged into the terminal at the time the order was processed at.

location_id.title: location_id
location_id.description: Only present on orders processed at point of sale. The unique numeric identifier for the physical location at which the order was processed.

processed_at.title: processed_at
processed_at.description: The date and time when the order was imported, in ISO 8601 format. This value can be set to dates in the past when importing from other systems. If no value is provided, it will be auto-generated based on the current date and time in Shopify.

app_id.title: app_id
app_id.description: Unique identifier of the app who created the order.

customer_locale.title: customer_locale
customer_locale.description: The two or three letter language code, optionally followed by a region modifier. Example values could be 'en', 'en-CA', 'en-PIRATE'.

browser_ip.title: browser_ip
browser_ip.description: The IP address of the browser used by the customer when placing the order.

order_number.title: order_number
order_number.description: A unique numeric identifier for the order. This one is used by the shop owner and customer. This is different from the id property, which is also a unique numeric identifier for the order, but used for API purposes.

discount_codes.title: discount_codes
discount_codes.description: Applicable discount codes that can be applied to the order. If no codes exist the value will default to blank.

note_attributes.title: note_attributes
note_attributes.description: Extra information that is added to the order. Each array entry must contain a hash with "name" and "value" keys as shown above.

payment_gateway_names.title: payment_gateway_names
payment_gateway_names.description: The list of all payment gateways used for the order.

processing_method.title: processing_method
processing_method.description: States the type of payment processing method. Valid values are: checkout, direct, manual, offsite or express.

source_name.title: source_name
source_name.description: Where the order originated. May only be set during creation, and is not writeable thereafter. Orders created through official Shopify channels have protected values that cannot be assigned by other API clients during order creation. These protected values are: "web", "pos", "iphone", and "android" Orders created via the API may be assigned any other string of your choice. If source_name is unspecified, new orders are assigned the value "api".

fulfillment_status.title: fulfillment_status
fulfillment_status.description: The status of the order fulfillment. Valid values are: fulfilled, null, partial.

tax_lines.title: tax_lines
tax_lines.description: An array of tax_line objects, each of which details the total taxes applicable to the order. Each tax line object has the following properties: price, rate, title.

tags.title: tags
tags.description: Tags are additional short descriptors, commonly used for filtering and searching, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. For example, if an order has three tags: tag1, tag2, tag3. Each individual tag is limited to 40 characters in length.

order_status_url.title: order_status_url
order_status_url.description: The URL pointing to the order status web page. The URL will be null unless the order was created from a checkout.

line_items.title: line_items
line_items.description: A list of line item objects, each one containing information about an item in the order.

shipping_lines.title: shipping_lines
shipping_lines.description: An array of shipping_line objects, each of which details the shipping methods used.

billing_address.title: billing_address
billing_address.description: The mailing address associated with the payment method. This address is an optional field that will not be available on orders that do not require one.

shipping_address.title: shipping_address
shipping_address.description: The mailing address to where the order will be shipped. This address is optional and will not be available on orders that do not require one.

payment_details.title: payment_details
payment_details.description: Deprecated as of July 7, 2014. This information is instead available on transactions An object containing information about the payment.

items.description: Possible properties are: avs_result_code, credit_card_bin, credit_card_company, credit_card_number, cvv_result_code.

discount_code.title: discount_code
discount_code.description: Applicable discount codes that can be applied to the order. If no codes exist the value will default to blank.

amount.title: amount
amount.description: The value of the discount. The type field determines how this amount is calculated.

type.title: type
type.description: The type of discount. Value values are: fixed_amount, percentage, shipping.

note_attributes.title: note_attributes
note_attributes.description: Extra information that is added to the order. Each array entry must contain a hash with "name" and "value" keys.

receipt.title: receipt
receipt.description: An object of text fields that provide information about the receipt.

testcase.title: testcase
testcase.description: States whether or not the fulfillment was a testcase.

browser_height.title: browser_height
browser_height.description: The browser height in pixels, if available.

browser_width.title: browser_width
browser_width.description: The browser screen width in pixels, if available.

payment_gateway_names.title: payment_gateway_names
payment_gateway_names.description: The list of all payment gateways used for the order.

rate.title: rate
rate.description: The rate at which the tax is calculated for this tax line.

country_code.title: country_code
country_code.description: The country code of the location.

province_code.title: provice_code
province_code.description: The province code / state code for the location.

zip.title: zip
zip.description: Zip Code / Postal Code value of the location.

line_item.title: line_item
line_item.description: The single line item being returned.

line_item_id.description: The id of the related line item.
